item.title: Asking the Missing Piece: Context-Driven Clarification for Ambiguous VQA
item.description: We propose a context-driven clarification approach for ambiguous Visual Question Answering (VQA) tasks, enabling models to ask clarifying questions when faced with ambiguous queries. This work addresses the challenge of handling ambiguous visual questions by allowing models to seek clarification from users.
